title: Yauso Nerf Ideas
body: I think yasuo is currently too powerful when he builds tank, when he builds damage he does 2 shot you but he doesnt live forever and never die, I think his double crit should be more of a trade off, im thinking that building health armor and mr should reduce his bonus attack speed, it even works lorewise, hes a wind samurai, why would armor not slow him down, he is meant to be mobile and damaging, not mobile damaging and tanky as hell, he could even get compensation with more damage. Give him like scaling crit damage on his q  make a reason to level it up. I think he gets too much free stuff without there being adequate downfalls. Discuss below \/

replies.body: i would be happy with just a nerf to the flow shield, just have it build up out of combat.
